name: @vlsergey/react-bootstrap-pagetable
description: Complex solution to work with pageable data, including sorting, filtering, actions, changing displayed columns, etc.

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p ./src/tsconfig-cjs.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p ./src/tsconfig-esm.json
scripts.eslint:check: eslint --ignore-pattern "!.eslintrc.js" *.js src/**/*.ts src/**/*.tsx test/**/*.js test/**/*.tsx demo/*.js demo/src/**/*.tsx
scripts.eslint:fix: eslint --ignore-pattern "!.eslintrc.js" --fix *.js src/**/*.ts* test/**/*.js test/**/*.ts* demo/*.js demo/src/**/*.tsx
scripts.git:commitDocs: git add docs/* && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "Automatically rebuild docs by package.json script"
scripts.test:watch:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development karma start karma.conf.js --no-single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run eslint:fix && npm test && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean --prefix=demo && npm run build --prefix=demo && npm run git:commitDocs
